Replace.Text: [ICON_BULLET][ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Ages last 70% longer. During a Golden Age, units receive +2 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and a +20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Persian units move faster in hills and uneven terrain.
Pax Sinica

[ICON_BULLET]During a Golden Age, China receive additional +20% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_PEACE] Faith output in all cities and +20% [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation nationwide. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Chinese mercantilist tradition grants +25% trade routes. Land maintenance is reduced by 10%.

Row.Text: The mighty Chinese empire is now in [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pax Sinica[ENDCOLOR]! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Every tile in your empire that produces at least 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold produces 1 extra. +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People Earning Rate empire-wide.

Replace.Text: [ICON_BULLET]Each Scientist +3 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, Engineer +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, Merchant +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, Writer, Artist and Musician +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]American expansionist tradition grants +35% faster border growth for cities; Naval [ICON_GOLD]maintenance is reduced by 10%
Great Russian Soul

[ICON_BULLET]The first 8 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in your cities don't generate [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness. +6 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +12 [ICON_RES_CONSUMER] Consumer Goods for all cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Russian military might grants -10% unit maintenance cost. All Units gain +15% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus while fighting within their own territory.

[ICON_BULLET]Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills. No maintenance costs for improvements in Hills; half cost elsewhere. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Andean empires mastery of the mountains grants -50% [ICON_GOLD] maintenance cost for all improvements; Military units can cross mountains after the creation of a great general.

[ICON_BULLET]1 Level up for all Lv2 -Lv5 cities (England only has Lv1-Lv4 cities). All Units +15% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus while fighting outside their own territory. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]English Imperialism grants +30 Science and +30 Culture for every international trade route.
Revolutionary State

[ICON_BULLET][ICON_CULTURE]Culture cost of adopting policies reduced by 15% . +4 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output for all Great Works. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Frances rich military tradition grants +50% military experience for military units.
Gott Mit Uns

[ICON_BULLET]Every 50 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production output in a city offer additional +10 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +10 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output. The bonus are added to the base outputs of your cities so they can be multiplied by buildings, policies, etc. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]German ferocity and courage has echoed through the ages; Generate Great Generals 20% faster.
Blood and Marble

[ICON_BULLET]+12 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for all cities and it never expires. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards any buildings in all cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Roman expansionist ethos grants -33% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhapiness from the number of controlled cities.
The Gift from the Nile

[ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold in every tile next to a river and +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Flood Plains tiles worked by your city. +8 [ICON_RES_MANPOWER] Manpower per city. +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Wonder construction. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Egypt and it's magnificent capital grants +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION]production towards buildings in the capital.
Eternal Freedom
[ICON_BULLET]Receive a free Social Policy when you advance to the next era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Polish nationalist fervor grants +15% [ICON_STRENGTH]combat bonus vs Civs with more cities.
Punishment of God

[ICON_BULLET]+5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Pasture. +3 [ICON_MOVES] Movement for all Mounted Units, Tank Units, Land Hit-and-run Units and Helicopter Units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Gain technology progress and science on capturing cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mongolian Civilization does not require cities to exist.

[ICON_BULLET]Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged. Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture when you build a Military Unit (100% of its [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength). [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Japan's centuries of warfare grants -10% maintenance for naval and army units.

[ICON_BULLET]-50% experience needed to earn their next promotion for all units. All cities receive a free Ikanda. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unit maintenance is reduced by 15% and gain +33% attack and defence when fighting a technologically superior enemy in friendly territory.

[ICON_BULLET]Land Melee units and Naval Melee units pay no Movement [ICON_MOVES] to pillage and pillage Gold equal to 300% of the damage inflicted on a city. Receive triple [ICON_GOLD] Gold from barbarian encampments or pillaging cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Danes have been a nation of seafarers; gain +2 [ICON_CULTURE]culture output for every Fishing Net, Workboat and Offshore Platform.

[ICON_BULLET]When a city is conquered by force, gain a free Technology discovered by its owner (one Technology per enemy city). If there are at least 5 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens left in the city after capturing, +1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each city serves as a bastion of culture, gain +12 culture from each city.
Sons of Hellas

[ICON_BULLET]City-State [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence degrades at half and recovers at twice the normal rate. Gain 3 more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence (at Standard speed) per turn with City-States you could demand tribute from. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units require 33% less experience for promotions.

[ICON_BULLET]Defeated Barbarian unit in encampments will join you. Receive [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_PEACE] Faith after destroying a city (amount = 10*turn, 1,000 maximum). Borrow City names from other in-game Civs. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Due to the nomadic nature of Hunnic Civilization, a city is not needed to exist.
The Eternal State

[ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Quarry, Fishing Net. +4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Strategic Resources. +25% speed for worker's Tile Improvement construction rate. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ottoman expansionism grants faster city border growth rate.

[ICON_BULLET]+15 Gold [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for each Trade Route with a different civ or City-State. +25 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each Trade Route sent to Morocco. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All Land Units receive a [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus (+20%) when fighting in Desert Tiles.

[ICON_BULLET]Only lose 2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from a Luxury Resource if your last copy of it is traded away. All cities receive a free Market. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval [ICON_GOLD]unit maintenance is reduced by 15%.

[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Specialists. +40 [ICON_GOLD] Base Gold for every Sea International Trade Route and +50% Range for Cargoships. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Carthaginian mercantilism grants +30% trade routes.

[ICON_BULLET]Resource diversity grants twice as much [ICON_GOLD] Gold for Portugal in Trade Routes. All coastal Cities receive a free Harbor. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The rich Portugese imperial and naval tradition grants -20% maintenance cost for naval units; +20% strength when fighting city states.

[ICON_BULLET]Cannot gain settlers nor annex cities. May purchase in puppet cities and puppet cities offers full [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output and [ICON_FOOD] Food Growth. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Double the normal number of Trade Routes and [ICON_TOURISM] Theming Bonus in [ICON_CAPITAL] Captal. A Merchant of Venice appears after researching Optics. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Venetian mercantilism grants +35 gold for every international trade route operated from the city.

[ICON_BULLET]The first 3 cities founded on continents other than where Indonesia started each provide 2 unique Luxury Resources. These 3 cities are free from Corruption and Public Security problems, cost No [ICON_GOLD] Gold maintance and can never be razed. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Indonesias rich history and tradition grants -10% [ICON_CULTURE]culture cost for policies. Centuries of navigating the islands grants +4 movement when embarked.

[ICON_BULLET]Founded cities start with additional territory (6 tiles). All cities receive a free Granary. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Shoshone and their insightful leadership grant free movement of units within City State territory.

[ICON_BULLET]Can embark and move over Oceans immediately. Lv 4 and Lv 5 Cities are treated as Lv 3 Cities. +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus if within 2 tiles of a Moai.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Polynesian naval tradition grants embarked units more movement; Fishing nets yield +2 [ICON_FOOD]food and +1 [ICON_CULTURE]culture.
Huey Tlatoani

[ICON_BULLET]Gains [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire from each enemy unit killed (70% of their [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength). [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Aztec military innovation grants -20% army maintenance cost.

[ICON_BULLET]Rivers and adjacent difficult terrain count as clear terrain for [ICON_MOVES] Movement. Rivers extend length of land trade routes as if they were roads. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every Trading Post.
Enlightened Despotism

[ICON_BULLET]Receive free Great Scientist when you discover Writing. Earn Great Scientists 50% faster. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Babylons great scientific innovation grants +30 science for every international trade route.

[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for all Specialists. All Units receive a [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus (+25%) when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than Ethiopia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Ethiopian Civilization has harboured a rich religious tradition. Grants an extra religious belief.
Population Growth
[ICON_BULLET]-30% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from number of [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]India's rich diversity lowers policies cost by 15%.
Ordem and Progresso

[ICON_BULLET]Tourism [ICON_TOURISM] output is +100% during their Golden Ages. Earn Great Artists, Musicians, and Writers 100% faster during their Golden Ages. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from number of [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens.
Second Rome

[ICON_BULLET]Choose one more Belief than normal when you found a Religion. A Great Prophet appears after researching Writing. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Byzantine religious traditions grants +50% religion spread from trade routes; +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION]production towards Wonders.

[ICON_BULLET][ICON_GOLD] Gold bonus for discovering a Natural Wonder (Increased bonus for being the first to discover). [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness, and tile yields from Natural Wonders tripled. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The spirit of Spanish exploration granths 33% lower naval unit maintenance; Religious pressure emnating from trade routes tripled.

[ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith per city with an adjacent unimproved Forest. Bonus increases to +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith in Cities with 3 or more adjacent unimproved Forest tiles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Celtic Druidism grants an additional religious belief. +4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Camp and Lumbermill.
Habsburgian Prestige

[ICON_BULLET]Can spend [ICON_GOLD] Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for 5 turns(starting from around 500 [ICON_GOLD] Gold in the Ancient Era and the price will rise when Austria entering a new era). A Great Musician appears after researching Acoustics. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Austrias rich cultural history grants +10% [ICON_CULTURE]culture from cultural buildings.
Prosperity in Unity

[ICON_BULLET][ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and [ICON_PEACE] Faith from friendly City-States increased by 200%. +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for all Specialists. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Siamese diplomatic tradition grants the ability to annex long term City State allies for gold.
Glorious Caliphate

[ICON_BULLET]+100% Range for Caravans. +300% for the efficiency of your trade routes spread the home city's religion. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_PEACE] Faith from every Oasis. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Arab mysticism grants the ability to choose an extra religious belief; Golden ages are 30% longer.
Empire in the North

[ICON_BULLET]Gain 500 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with a Great Person gift to a City-State. When declaring friendship, Sweden and their friend gain a +15% boost to [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person generation. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The spirit of Swedish innovation grants 33% more [ICON_RESEARCH] Great Scientists.

+2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for all Specialists. +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for all Great Person tile improvements. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Koreas rich tradition of scientific and cultural progress grants +2 [ICON_CULTURE]Culture per Scientist.

[ICON_BULLET]After researching Theology, receive a [ICON_RESEARCH] Science boost each time a scientific building/Wonder is built in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. Also receive a bonus Great Person at the end of every Maya Long Count calendar cycle (every 394 years) (Each bonus person can only be chosen once) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mastery of the jungles provides no movement malus to any Mayan units.

[ICON_BULLET]Units move through Forest and Jungle in friendly territory as if they were Roads. These tiles can also be used to establish [ICON_CONNECTED] City Connections and speed up Caravans. All Land Units receive a [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Bonus (+20%) when fighting in Forest Tiles. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+4 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production for every Lumbermill.

Row.Text: Brazilian Soccer Player can only be created by building the Brazilian Football Pitch. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Brazilian Soccer Player can enter other nations' territory without an Open Border Agreement to generate one-time [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost like Great Musicians. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]All other nations will also receive the same amount of [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism boost generated by the Brazilian Soccer Player.

Association Football is the most popular sport in Brazil. The Brazilian national football team has won the FIFA World Cup tournament a record five times, in 1958, 1962, 1970, 1994 and 2002, and is the only team to succeed in qualifying for every World Cup competition ever held. It is among the favorites to win the trophy every time the competition is scheduled. After Brazil won its 3rd World Cup in 1970, they were awarded the Jules Rimet Trophy permanently. But 365 days before World Cup 2014 began, Brazil's rank dropped to 22nd, an all-time-low position.

Islamic Prophet is the unique prophet unit for Arabia. He can found or enhance a religion, construct the special Holy Site improvement and spread religion 4 times as the normal prophet unit. He can also conduct a trade mission in a City-State as the Great Merchant.

Prophets in Islam include "messengers", bringers of a divine revelation via an angel; and "prophets", lawbringers that Muslims believe were sent by God to every people, bringing God's message in a language they can understand. Belief in Islamic prophets is one of the six articles of the Islamic faith, and specifically mentioned in the Quran.
